title: Drawing, "Two Women Seated on a Wall, Cullercoats, England", 1881–82
medium: Graphite, charcoal on cream wove paper
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of two women, knitting a sock, while sitting on a stone wall; boats in the background, some are drawn over the underlying figure of a woman.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two Women Seated on a Wall, Cullercoats, England", 1881–82.
1881–82. Graphite, charcoal on cream wove paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-14.
